      • getGlobalMeanFeatureValue

        float getGlobalMeanFeatureValue()
        Returns:
        the average Feature F Measure over all clusters and all features

      • getFeatureFMeanValue

        float getFeatureFMeanValue(int f)
        Parameters:
        f - the feature selected according to its index in the matrix
        Returns:
        the average Feature F Measure for feature f over all clusters

      • getFeatureValue

        float getFeatureValue(int f,
                      int cluster)
        Parameters:
        f - the feature one wants to get the F-measure
        cluster - the cluster one is interested
        Returns:
        the average Feature F Measure for feature f and cluster cluster
